title: Placements Doubt
content: if i have only a fte offer, can i apply for companies which are internship + performance based fte because i need only the internship?

comments.body:
If you get an internship + fte you cannot apply for internship opportunities. That being said, if you have only fte offer you can apply for internship + fte opportunities.

This info is completely from time of placements last year.
Another doubt, If i have a T2 Internship + FTE, can I sit for dream tier Internship only?
Yes u can apply for internship + fte offer!
No only 1 internship you can take
